derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Greek keramikos, from keramos 'pottery'

entry.def: Ceramic is clay that has been heated to a very high temperature so that it becomes hard.
Ceramics are ceramic ornaments or objects.
Ceramics is the art of making artistic objects out of clay.

means.word_mean: 1. an artifact made of hard brittle material produced from nonmetallic minerals by firing at high temperatures
1. of or relating to or made from a ceramic;
